---
title: Tutorials
---




The tutorials linked here use a very simple implementation of the `CitableParser` designed to parse a corpus of all the known versions of Lincoln's Gettysburg Address, and to identify the form of tokens with the [part of speech code used by the Penn treebank project](https://www.ling.upenn.edu/courses/Fall_2003/ling001/penn_treebank_pos.html).
